verses.verse: וּבָעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> u-va-'Et And at that time הַהִיא֩ <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hi who יַעֲמֹ֨ד <S%H5975><s%> ya-'a-Mod stand up מִֽיכָאֵ֜ל <S%H4317><s%> mi-cha-'El shall Michael הַשַּׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> has-Sar prince הַגָּד֗וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol, the great הָעֹמֵד֮ <S%H5975><s%> ha-'o-Med which standeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei for the children עַמֶּךָ֒ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-me-Cha of thy people וְהָיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-ye-Tah and there shall be עֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et a time צָרָ֔ה <S%H6869><s%> tza-Rah, of trouble אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher such לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- never נִהְיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> nih-ye-Tah occurred מִֽהְי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> mih-Yot occurred גּ֔וֹי <S%H1471><s%> Goy, such as never was since there was a nation עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad until הָעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> ha-'Et [even] to that same time הַהִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hi; that וּבָעֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> u-va-'Et and at that time הַהִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hi he יִמָּלֵ֣ט <S%H4422><s%> yim-ma-Let shall be delivered עַמְּךָ֔ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-me-Cha, thy people כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- everyone הַנִּמְצָ֖א <S%H4672><s%> han-nim-Tza every one that shall be found כָּת֥וּב <S%H3789><s%> ka-Tuv written בַּסֵּֽפֶר׃ <S%H5612><s%> bas-Se-fer. in the book

וְרַבִּ֕ים <S%H7227><s%> ve-rab-Bim And many מִיְּשֵׁנֵ֥י <S%H3463><s%> mi-ye-she-Nei of them that sleep אַדְמַת־ <S%H127><s%> 'ad-mat- of the earth עָפָ֖ר <S%H6083><s%> 'a-Far in the dust יָקִ֑יצוּ <S%H6974><s%> ya-Ki-tzu; shall awake אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these לְחַיֵּ֣י <S%H2416><s%> le-chai-Yei life עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam, some to everlasting וְאֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh the others לַחֲרָפ֖וֹת <S%H2781><s%> la-cha-ra-Fot and some to shame לְדִרְא֥וֹן <S%H1860><s%> le-dir-'on contempt עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. [and] everlasting ס sa-Mek

וְהַ֨מַּשְׂכִּלִ֔ים <S%H7919><s%> ve-Ham-mas-ki-Lim, And they that be wise יַזְהִ֖רוּ <S%H2094><s%> yaz-Hi-ru shall shine כְּזֹ֣הַר <S%H2096><s%> ke-Zo-har as the brightness הָרָקִ֑יעַ <S%H7549><s%> ha-ra-Ki-a'; of the firmament וּמַצְדִּיקֵי֙ <S%H6663><s%> u-matz-di-Kei to righteousness הָֽרַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> ha-rab-Bim, and they that turn many כַּכּוֹכָבִ֖ים <S%H3556><s%> kak-ko-cha-Vim as the stars לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> va-'Ed. and ever פ Peh

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you דָֽנִיֵּ֗אל <S%H1840><s%> da-ni-Yel, But thou O Daniel סְתֹ֧ם <S%H5640><s%> se-Tom shut up הַדְּבָרִ֛ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim the words וַחֲתֹ֥ם <S%H2856><s%> va-cha-Tom and seal הַסֵּ֖פֶר <S%H5612><s%> has-Se-fer the book עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until עֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et [even] to the time קֵ֑ץ <S%H7093><s%> Ketz; of the end יְשֹׁטְט֥וּ <S%H7751><s%> ye-sho-te-Tu shall run to and fro רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim many וְתִרְבֶּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> ve-tir-Beh shall be increased הַדָּֽעַת׃ <S%H1847><s%> had-Da-'at. and knowledge

וְרָאִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> ve-ra-'I-ti looked אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I דָנִיֵּ֔אל <S%H1840><s%> da-ni-Yel, Then I Daniel וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold שְׁנַ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim two אֲחֵרִ֖ים <S%H312><s%> 'a-che-Rim other עֹמְדִ֑ים <S%H5975><s%> 'o-me-Dim; and behold there stood אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad the one הֵ֙נָּה֙ <S%H2008><s%> hen-nah on this side לִשְׂפַ֣ת <S%H8193><s%> lis-Fat of the bank הַיְאֹ֔ר <S%H2975><s%> hay-'Or, of the river וְאֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> ve-'e-Chad and the other הֵ֖נָּה <S%H2008><s%> Hen-nah this לִשְׂפַ֥ת <S%H8193><s%> lis-Fat on that side of the bank הַיְאֹֽר׃ <S%H2975><s%> hay-'Or. of the river

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, And [one] said לָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> la-'Ish to the man לְב֣וּשׁ <S%H3847><s%> le-Vush clothed הַבַּדִּ֔ים <S%H906><s%> hab-bad-Dim, in linen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who מִמַּ֖עַל <S%H4605><s%> mi-Ma-'al which [was] upon לְמֵימֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> le-mei-Mei the waters הַיְאֹ֑ר <S%H2975><s%> hay-'Or; of the river עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until מָתַ֖י <S%H4970><s%> ma-Tai How קֵ֥ץ <S%H7093><s%> ketz How long [shall it be to] the end הַפְּלָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6382><s%> hap-pe-la-'ot. marvellous thing

וָאֶשְׁמַ֞ע <S%H8085><s%> va-'esh-Ma' And I heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאִ֣ישׁ׀ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish the man לְב֣וּשׁ <S%H3847><s%> le-Vush clothed הַבַּדִּ֗ים <S%H906><s%> hab-bad-Dim, in linen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who מִמַּעַל֮ <S%H4605><s%> mi-ma-'Al which [was] upon לְמֵימֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> le-mei-Mei the waters הַיְאֹר֒ <S%H2975><s%> hay-'Or of the river וַיָּ֨רֶם <S%H7311><s%> vai-Ya-rem when he held up יְמִינ֤וֹ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-No his right hand וּשְׂמֹאלוֹ֙ <S%H8040><s%> u-se-mo-Lo and his left hand אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- toward הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim, unto heaven וַיִּשָּׁבַ֖ע <S%H7650><s%> vai-yish-sha-Va' and sware בְּחֵ֣י <S%H2416><s%> be-Chei by him that liveth הָעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> ha-'o-Lam; for ever כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki would be for לְמוֹעֵ֨ד <S%H4150><s%> le-mo-'Ed that [it shall be] for a time מֽוֹעֲדִ֜ים <S%H4150><s%> mo-'a-Dim times וָחֵ֗צִי <S%H2677><s%> va-Che-tzi, and an half וּכְכַלּ֛וֹת <S%H3615><s%> u-che-chal-Lot and when he shall have accomplished נַפֵּ֥ץ <S%H5310><s%> nap-Petz to scatter יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> yad- the power עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> 'am- people קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh of the holy תִּכְלֶ֥ינָה <S%H3615><s%> tich-Lei-nah all these [things] shall be finished כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all אֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh. these

וַאֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I שָׁמַ֖עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-ti And I heard וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not אָבִ֑ין <S%H995><s%> 'a-Vin; but I understood וָאֹ֣מְרָ֔ה <S%H559><s%> va-'O-me-Rah, not then said אֲדֹנִ֕י <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni I O my Lord מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> mah what אַחֲרִ֖ית <S%H319><s%> 'a-cha-Rit what [shall be] the end אֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh. of these פ Peh

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> lech Go דָּנִיֵּ֑אל <S%H1840><s%> da-ni-Yel; Daniel כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for סְתֻמִ֧ים <S%H5640><s%> se-tu-Mim [are] closed up וַחֲתֻמִ֛ים <S%H2856><s%> va-cha-tu-Mim and sealed הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim for the words עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et till the time קֵֽץ׃ <S%H7093><s%> Ketz. of the end

יִ֠תְבָּֽרֲרוּ <S%H1305><s%> Yit-ba-ra-ru shall be purified וְיִֽתְלַבְּנ֤וּ <S%H3835><s%> ve-yit-lab-be-Nu and made white וְיִצָּֽרְפוּ֙ <S%H6884><s%> ve-yitz-tza-re-Fu and tried רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim, Many וְהִרְשִׁ֣יעוּ <S%H7561><s%> ve-hir-Shi-'u shall do wickedly רְשָׁעִ֔ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im, but the wicked וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not יָבִ֖ינוּ <S%H995><s%> ya-Vi-nu shall understand כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner רְשָׁעִ֑ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im; and none of the wicked וְהַמַּשְׂכִּלִ֖ים <S%H7919><s%> ve-ham-mas-ki-Lim but the wise יָבִֽינוּ׃ <S%H995><s%> ya-Vi-nu. shall understand

וּמֵעֵת֙ <S%H6256><s%> u-me-'Et And from the time הוּסַ֣ר <S%H5493><s%> hu-Sar [sacrifice] shall be taken away הַתָּמִ֔יד <S%H8548><s%> hat-ta-Mid, [that] the daily וְלָתֵ֖ת <S%H5414><s%> ve-la-Tet set up שִׁקּ֣וּץ <S%H8251><s%> shik-Kutz and the abomination שֹׁמֵ֑ם <S%H8074><s%> sho-Mem; that maketh desolate יָמִ֕ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim days אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef [there shall be] a thousand מָאתַ֥יִם <S%H3967><s%> ma-Ta-yim two hundred וְתִשְׁעִֽים׃ <S%H8673><s%> ve-tish-'Im. and ninety

אַשְׁרֵ֥י <S%H835><s%> 'ash-Rei Blessed הַֽמְחַכֶּ֖ה <S%H2442><s%> ham-chak-Keh [is] he that waiteth וְיַגִּ֑יעַ <S%H5060><s%> ve-yag-Gi-a'; and cometh לְיָמִ֕ים <S%H3117><s%> le-ya-Mim days אֶ֕לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef to the thousand שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> she-Losh three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim and thirty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H2568><s%> va-cha-mish-Shah. and five

וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> lech go לַקֵּ֑ץ <S%H7093><s%> lak-Ketz; till the end וְתָנ֛וּחַ <S%H5117><s%> ve-ta-Nu-ach [be] for thou shalt rest וְתַעֲמֹ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> ve-ta-'a-Mod and stand לְגֹרָלְךָ֖ <S%H1486><s%> le-go-ra-le-Cha in thy lot לְקֵ֥ץ <S%H7093><s%> le-Ketz at the end הַיָּמִֽין׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Min. of the days
